Articles.Content:
Hi, I\'d just like to introduce myself, since I\'m pretty new in the forum.

My name is Niklas Korz, I\'m 15 years old and I\'m from Germany.

I got introduced to KSP about half a year ago by [KCST](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;u=8814) (well, by the real person behind this name ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)).

I\'m a hobby developer, mostly using Objective-C and Python, although I\'ve also experience in C, C++, Java, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, CoffeeScript and not much anymore but a bit C#.

That\'s it. I haven\'t bought the game yet, but I\'m going to do this very soon.

Yours,

dindresto.

WELLCOME

to the KSP Forums, and I wish you much fun....

Yours KCST

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Mince

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Originality seems pretty low, better fix that.

After coming out of your mother , you began your journey as a human, you went to school and learned to read and write and do math stuffs, you are also 20 percent cooler for being able to program in so many languages , a friend of yours discussed the struggle of green men on a fictional planet to conquer space, and so then you came here, and that\'s when your live began, and ended.

Welcome.

**Stories and Popcorn!**

**-Arcane**
